The Kineme Audio Device Info Patch provides information about the available hardware audio output devices.
http://kineme.net/
List of devices supporting audio input, including Device UID, Name, Manufacturer, and Number of Input and Output Channels
List of devices supporting audio output, including Device UID, Name, Manufacturer, and Number of Input and Output Channels
